participant_1.background:
I visit craft websites to learn about new sewing projects and video game websites to find new games to play.
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I love spending time outdoors, whether I'm taking pictures of nature or riding my horses.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.

content.text: I love taking pictures of nature. Do you have any favorite places to visit?
I love going to the beach! I'm from California, so I'm lucky to live close to the ocean.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to visit California. I'm from Arizona, so I'm always around the desert.
Have you been to the Grand Canyon? I've always wanted to go!
Yes, I have! It's amazing! I went on a road trip with my family when I was younger. We went to the Grand Canyon, Bryce Canyon, and Zion National Park.
That sounds like an amazing trip! I'm so jealous.
It was really great! We saw so much beautiful nature. I'm glad I got to experience it.
I'm sure I'll get to go one day. I'm just not sure when.
Well, whenever you do, I hope you have a great time!
